definition[0]: someone who answers questions, especially in a survey
example[0]: Only 62 percent of respondents said they were satisfied.
definition[1]: someone who has to defend their own case in a law court, especially in a divorce case
definition[2]: someone who replies to an advertisement or set of questions
example[1]: Only 2.7% of the survey respondents said they had plans to buy a home in the next six months.
definition[3]: someone who defends themselves in a law case
example[2]: Without admitting the allegations, the respondents agreed with the courtâ€™s finding that the firm failed to maintain the minimum capital required.
